title: Broken Hero Sword
summaries: The Broken Hero Sword is a Post-Plantera Hardmode crafting material. On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, it has a 25*1/4 (25%) / 43.75*7/16 (43.75%) chance of being dropped by Mothron. On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, it instead has a 0.4*1/250 (0.4%) chance of being dropped by Frankensteins and Swamp Things.
It is not a weapon itself, and therefore can neither be swung, reforged, or placed on a Weapon Rack.
